content: A word cloud is a collection of words organized into a shape. Classic.wordclouds.com allows you to create word clouds in different shapes, colors, and sizes. Examples of when you might make a word cloud include organizing commonly used words or memorializing a description of your childhood home. After creating a word cloud, you can export it as an image or share it to a social site, such as Facebook or X.
NOTE: Zygomatic replaced classic.wordclouds.com with WordClouds.com, which saves word clouds as .WCLD2 files instead of WCLD files.

description: A WCLD file stores information about a word cloud created by classic.wordclouds.com, a web tool for customizing word clouds. It contains all of the information about the word cloud, including a list of words, font, shape, and theme colors. When a user saves a word cloud with classic.wordclouds.com, the website automatically downloads a WCLD file to your desktop to store the information; users can upload the WCLD file to the site to open the word cloud and continue editing it.
